jobs.title: UI/UX Designer
jobs.description:
To
 Aisha Ibrahim Esq
LETTER OF APPOINTMENT

On behalf of the ThriveTrek Entrepreneurship Center (TEC), it is with great pleasure and excitement that I extend to you this letter of appointment. We are thrilled to welcome you as Legal Advisor within our esteemed organization, effective from 15th April, 2024
Your appointment comes as a result of our thorough assessment of your qualifications, expertise, and passion for entrepreneurship. We are confident that your exceptional skills and dedication will make valuable contributions to our mission of empowering aspiring entrepreneurs and fostering innovation within our community.
As a member of our team, you will be entrusted with Providing legal counsel and guidance to ensure compliance with laws and regulations and protect the organizationâ€™s interest. Your role is pivotal in advancing our objectives and ensuring the success of our initiatives.
Please find enclosed your official appointment package, which includes your appointment letter, a detailed description of your responsibilities, and other relevant documents. Additionally, your appointment is assigned the unique serial ID number: TEC-24025.
We believe that your appointment marks the beginning of a mutually rewarding journey, and we are excited to embark on this path together. Your dedication and commitment will play a significant role in shaping the future of entrepreneurship at ThriveTrek Entrepreneurship Center.
Once again, congratulations on your appointment! We look forward to your valuable contributions and wish you every success in your new role.
Should you have any questions or require further clarification, please do not hesitate to contact me at Tel: 08109186302, 08060370336

Warm regards,

Aliyu Babangida National 
National President 
ThriveTrek Entrepreneurship Center (TEC)
